welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ivoti, Brazil! Known for its charming architecture and rich culture, this city is ready to enchant you. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ivoti has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nossa Senhora de Fátima Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main and largest terminal at Salgado Filho Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salgado Filho Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Campo Dos Bugres Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
